name: T - Noah Marica
_source: speak;Noah; Hey, you, recruit!{w} Scramble into line!
speak;Marica; Hm? Are you talking to me?
speak;Noah; Who else would I be talking to?
speak;Marica; Sorry, it's just that I've only had one captain, and her name is Sonia.
speak;Noah; Hm, where I come from,{w} you'd be washing the stables for a week if you gave a comment like that to an officer.
speak;Marica; Then it's a good thing that I'm not in the military and you're not my officer.
speak;Noah; So <bconvo>this</> is what our allies are like?{w} I'm not impressed.
